snippet: President Obama generally refrains from talking about the candidates vying to succeed him in 2016, but when it comes to Gov. Scott Walker of Wisconsin, he’s made a couple of exceptions.
abstract: President Obama generally refrains from talking about the candidates vying to succeed him in 2016, but when it comes to Gov. Scott Walker of Wisconsin, he’s made a couple of exceptions.

headline.main: Obama Makes Walker the Exception, Again
